newsitem.title: GERMANY: German shares end higher, but off records.
newsitem.headline: German shares end higher, but off records.

text.p: 1144 GMT - German shares end uneventful session strongly higher, but off record level. Shares boosted at the open by Wall Street and insurance industry merger, but little follow-through buying with U.S. market closed.
* 30-share DAX up 55.14 points at 3,942.53. IBIS DAX, which reflects all-day computer trade in DAX up 2.15 points at 3,941.88. New DAX record high set at 3,945.68.
* Munich Re up 485 marks to 5,400 after announcing it would merge its Hamburg-Mannheimer unit with Victoria Holding.
* Chemical shares also higher including Hoechst.
